comment.text: The translation key "SpacesInLocalPart" is used to display an error message when a local part of a username or email address contains spaces. This error typically appears in dialogs or input fields where users can edit their account information. The goal is to prevent usernames from being set up incorrectly and to ensure consistency with standard naming conventions.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Lokal yolda boşluqlar icazə verilmir" while understandable, doesn't directly translate 'can't contain spaces'. A more accurate translation would convey a prohibition.
The word 'yolda' (in/on the way) isn't appropriate in this context. 'Hissədə' (in the part) would be better.

The translation "Lokaler Teil beinhaltet Leerzeichen" doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Local part can't contain spaces." "Beinhaltet" implies 'contains', while the English implies a restriction.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Lokaler Teil darf keine Leerzeichen enthalten

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The verb conjugation 'ne peux pas' is incorrect. It should be 'ne peut pas'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Le local ne peut pas contenir d'espace

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Տեղական մասը չի կարող բացատներ պարունակել' while technically correct, doesn't flow naturally in Armenian. A more natural phrasing would convey the same meaning with better readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Տեղական մասում չի կարող լինել բացատներ

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation "ພື່ນທີ່ທ້ອງຖິ້ນບໍ່ພຽງພໍ" does not accurately convey the meaning of "Local part can't contain spaces".  'ພື່ນທີ່ທ້ອງຖິ້ນ' translates roughly to 'local area' or 'local part', but 'ບໍ່ພຽງພໍ' means 'insufficient' or 'not enough'. The English sentence means that spaces are not allowed, not that the local part is insufficient.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "ສ່ວນພື້ນທີ່ທ້ອງຖິ່ນຫ້າມມີຊ່ອງຫວ່າງ" (Suan phuen thi thong thin ham mi chong wang) - 'Local part is not allowed to have spaces'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Identyfikator użytkownika" is a valid translation for 'local part', it's not the most natural or easily understood phrasing for a general user in this context. 'Local part' refers to the username before the '@' in an email address or similar identifier. A more user-friendly translation would capture that meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Nazwa użytkownika nie może zawierać spacji

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "Имя почтового ящика содержит пробелы" is too literal and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of "Local part can't contain spaces." It implies that the local part *does* contain spaces, which is the problem being described.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more accurate translation would be something like "Локальная часть не может содержать пробелы" or "В локальной части не допускаются пробелы".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'ස්ථානීය කොටසේ හිස්තැන් අඩංගු නොවිය යුතුය' while technically conveying the meaning, is a rather formal and literal translation. A more natural and common way to express this in Sinhala would be something closer to 'දේශීය කොටසට හිස්තැන් තිබිය යුතු නැත' or 'දේශීය කොටසට ඉඩ තිබිය යුතු නැත'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දේශීය කොටසට හිස්තැන් තිබිය යුතු නැත

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Лоцал парт не сме садржати размаке' is a literal transliteration of "Local part can't contain spaces" and doesn't accurately convey the meaning in natural Serbian. A more idiomatic translation would be something like 'Локални део не може да садржи размаке'. The word 'Лоцал' is not standard Serbian.  'Локални део' is preferred over a transliteration of 'local part'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Локални део не може да садржи размаке
